message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I have to consider my minimum price to make this deal worthwhile. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value it holds for me. I'm counteroffering at $1050000.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. I'm thinking of $975000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to the value it holds for me. I'm counteroffering at $1025000.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to save some money. I'm willing to go up to $980000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I'm not willing to go below $1020000. I think that's the minimum I can accept to make this deal worthwhile. I'm counteroffering at $1020000.
I'm willing to meet you at the minimum you're willing to accept, but I need to save a bit more. I'm willing to go up to $990000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet my minimum, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $1015000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to the value it holds for me. I'm counteroffering at $1015000.
I'm not willing to go above $985000. This is my final offer. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
